required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of ABC008 in Adult Patients With Inclusion Body Myositis (IBM)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-Label, Ascending Dose Study of ABC008 in Adult Patients With Inclusion Body Myositis (IBM)

brief_summary.textblock: An open-label, ascending dose study for adult patients with inclusion body myositis (IBM).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through Study Completion an average of 28 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Characterize the safety and tolerability profile of escalating dose levels of ABC008 in IBM when administered subcutaneously (SC) as measured by the number and severity of treatment emergent adverse events, serious adverse events, and adverse events of special interest, number of dose limiting toxicities.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and throughout the 24 weeks of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the peak serum concentration (Cmax) of a single dose of ABC008

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of time to peak serum concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and throughout the 24 weeks of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the time to peak serum concentration (Tmax) of a single dose of ABC008
Assess the terminal half-life (t½) of ABC008

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of area under the concentration versus time curve from time zero to 24 hours post-dose (AUC0-24hr)
secondary_outcome.description: Assess the area under the concentration versus time curve of a single dose of ABC008 from time zero to 24 hours post-dose (AUC0-24hr)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and throughout the 24 weeks of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of apparent clearance (CL/F) of a single dose of ABC008

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and throughout the 24 weeks of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of apparent volume of distribution (Vz/F) of a single dose of ABC008

secondary_outcome.measure: Characterization of changes in KLRG1 expressing lymphocytes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 and throughout the 24 weeks of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: Characterize changes in KLRG1 expressing lymphocytes

arm_group.description: tbd (if an alternative dose cohort is needed)

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of either clinico-pathologically defined IBM, clinically defined IBM, or probable IBM according to the European Neuromuscular Center (ENMC) IBM 2011
- Able to arise from a chair (with or without armrests) without support from another person or device
- Able to ambulate at least 20 feet / 6 meters with or without assistive device
Exclusion Criteria:
- Taking > 7.5 mg prednisolone (or equivalent) or on intravenous immunoglobulin (IVIg) or other immunosuppressants within the last 3 months. Topical, nasal, and ocular corticosteroids are allowed unless they are being widely applied or the severity of the underlying condition makes them unsuitable in the Investigator's opinion. Local steroid injections are allowed
